Palm_Beach_Gardens.Country Club at Mirasol: The Country Club at Mirasol (also known as Mirasol) is a large, gated community located in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida. The community, developed by Taylor Woodrow, contains just under 1,200 homes and home sites on two championship golf courses along with natural preserves and lakes. Mirasol is spread over 2,300 acres (930 ha) on property previously owned by the John D. and Catherine T. MacArthur Foundation.
